codes.author: Psychonauter, Noki Doki, Dan Salvato, Link Master, James0x57
codes.title: DPad Functions
codes.description:
Allows various game modifications. Button combinations:
CombinationResult
D-Pad leftSave Mario's position
D-Pad rightLoad Mario's position
D-Pad upReplace all dialog with a single "!!!" line
D-Pad downRestore dialog boxes
B+D-Pad leftLock rocket nozzle
B+D-Pad rightLock turbo nozzle
B+D-Pad upLock hover nozzle
B+D-Pad downRelease nozzle lock
X+D-Pad leftNo FLUDD in secrets
X+D-Pad rightFLUDD in all secrets
X+D-Pad upRegrab last held object
X+D-Pad downFLUDD in completed secrets (default)

codes.author: Noki Doki
codes.title: Infinite Lives
codes.description: Prevents the life counter from decreasing.

codes.author: Psychonauter, Noki Doki
codes.title: Disable Blue Coin Flag
codes.description: Prevents the game from setting the blue coin flag, which makes them respawn after reentering the level.

codes.author: Psychonauter
codes.title: FMV Skips
codes.description: Allows skipping FMVs without having to watch them once first.

codes.author: Psychonauter
codes.title: Mute Background Music
codes.description: Mutes background music, but keeps SFX on.

codes.author: Psychonauter
codes.title: Remove Save Boxes
codes.description: Removes all saveboxes.

codes.author: Noki Doki
codes.title: Unlock Yoshi
codes.description: Unlocks Yoshi everywhere.

codes.author: Noki Doki
codes.title: Unlock Nozzles
codes.description: Unlocks all nozzle boxes.

codes.author: Noki Doki
codes.title: Free Pause
codes.description: Allows you to pause mid-air and during cutscenes.

codes.author: Noki Doki
codes.title: Enable Exit Area Everywhere
codes.description: Enables 'Exit Area' on Plaza and Airstrip.

codes.author: Psychonauter, Noki Doki
codes.title: Shine Get Timer
codes.description:
Adds the ingame timer to every level, starting on the last black frame after the loading screen and ending as soon as the 'Shine Get' animation starts (similar to the x-cam timer of SM64). The timer pauses during loading times.

Requires the Level Select code, Fast Any% or Stage Loader to be active.

codes.author: Psychonauter, Dan Salvato, Noki Doki
codes.title: Level Select
codes.description: Allows warping to other levels when starting a file or when exiting level by holding the combination until the screen turns black. This code is not compatible with the Fast Any%, Stage Loader or Stage Randomizer code. Codes:

codes.author: Psychonauter, Noki Doki
codes.title: Fast Any%
codes.description: Loads stages in any% order, skips all save boxes, replaces all dialog with "!!!" (except for the Pianta 5 secret) and makes all FMVs skippable (except for the Pinna 1 cutscenes). This code is not compatible with the Level Select, Stage Loader or Stage Randomizer code.

codes.author: Unknown, Noki Doki
codes.title: Any Fruit Opens Yoshi Eggs
codes.description: Allows opening Yoshi eggs with a different fruit than the one depicted.

codes.author: Noki Doki
codes.title: Infinite Juice
codes.description: Prevents Yoshi from despawning by running out of juice.

codes.author: Noki Doki
codes.title: Stage Randomizer (Experimental)
codes.description: Loads stages in randomized order. This code is not compatible with the Level Select or Fast Any% code.

codes.author: Psychonauter, Noki Doki
codes.title: Replace Episode names with their ID
codes.description: Replaces the Episode names with the episode number in the demo screen. (Useful for the stage randomizer and the stage loader.)

codes.author: Ralf, Psychonauter
codes.title: Shine Outfit
codes.description: Always wear shine outfit and sunglasses.

codes.author: Noki Doki
codes.title: Position/angle/speed display
codes.description: Shows Mario's position, angle and speed at any given time.

codes.author: Noki Doki
codes.title: Intro skip
codes.description: Removes the logos and cutscene that normally play before the title screen when loading or resetting the game.

codes.author: Noki Doki
codes.title: Respawn One-Time Shines
codes.description: Allows Shines obtained by cleaning graffiti, the Shine Gate or the bells to respawn.

codes.author: Noki Doki
codes.title: Force Plaza Events
codes.description: Forces the unlock events for Ricco, Gelato and Yoshi to happen any time the correct version of the plaza is loaded. Nozzle unlock events take precedence over Yoshi's if their conditions are met.

codes.author: Noki Doki
codes.title: Fix Memory Card Encoding
codes.description: Enable this if your Nintendont saves do not work on your other loader (e.g. Gecko OS on a Japanese console).
